Articles.Content:
Hello every body, i've just got hold of the demo from steam just to try it out and see if my PC can handle the game; so far so good. I'd seen some great vid's on 'you tube' and thought that i'd love to try it out.

I've made two flights so far, one suborbital and the other tonight got into a 390 mile orbit, not quite what i was planning but wow never the less! 

I have an interest in engineering both areonautic and space and i'm a model maker two so assembling da bitz is no problem for me.

Now i need to work on much wider trajectories (tonight was straight up and almost straight back down again) and practicing steering the stack.

Here's to saving up for the full game, btw i can't find it anywhere but steam and that at Ã‚Â£29.99, and nowhere else not even Amazon, anybody seen it elsewhere?

see you up there.

Go to [www.kerbalspaceprogram.com](www.kerbalspaceprogram.com), you can buy it there. It comes as a standalone executable.

Welcome to the forum!

Welcome aboard husheruk!

Kerbal Space Program is a great game, perhaps the greatest game I've ever purchased! I hope you'll prioritize buying it over any other games and put it at the top of your gift wish-lists: you won't be sorry!

Regards,

Northstar
Hi husheruk! We hope you have a wonderful time here.
